intent.user_query: Calculate the average time between a customer's registration and their first purchase.

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT AVG(SaleDate - RegistrationDate) AS AverageTimeToFirstPurchase FROM (SELECT c.RegistrationDate, MIN(s.SaleDate) AS SaleDate FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.RegistrationDate) AS Subquery;

arguments.sql: SELECT AVG(SaleDate - RegistrationDate) AS AverageTimeToFirstPurchase FROM (SELECT c.RegistrationDate, MIN(s.SaleDate) AS SaleDate FROM fitness_db.Customers c JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON c.CustomerID = s.CustomerID GROUP BY c.RegistrationDate) AS Subquery;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
